text:
#Sport Science Lecturer @SaulCuttell is trekking 4,900 metres to the top of #Kilimanjaro in memory of his Mum and to raise funds for @PancreaticCanUK.

Find out what training and equipment goes into such a mountainous endeavour: https://t.co/tzx54uxYn8

#cancer #africa https://t.co/DRt3BzUojd
